title: Rock-shell armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Rock-shell armour (also known as Rockshell armour) is Fremennik armour for warriors that can only be made by going to Waterbirth Island or bought. Additionally, parts of this armour can be dropped by Dagannoth Rex. This set of armour cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Rock-shell armour
A player wearing rock-shell armour.

Rock-shell armour (also known as Rockshell armour) is Fremennik armour for warriors that can only be made by going to Waterbirth Island or bought. Additionally, parts of this armour can be dropped by Dagannoth Rex. This set of armour cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

Excluding the gloves and boots, the armour shares the same bonuses as rune equipment, requiring a Defence level of 40 to wear as well. While wearing the full set of armour (boots and gloves are not needed), the title of "Rockcrusher" is added to the Fremennik name of the player when being addressed by other Fremennik. Since this armour can only be worn after completing The Fremennik Trials quest, players are advised not to buy it unless they have completed the quest, or plan to do so soon.

This set can be stored in the armour case space of a costume room in a player-owned house. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

Contents

  • 1 Making rock-shell armour
  • 2 Components and bonuses
  • 3 Trivia
  • 4 See also

Making rock-shell armour[edit | edit source]

The raw materials for this armour are rock-shell chunks (helmet), rock-shell splinters (legs), and rock-shell shards (plate). These are dropped by Giant rock crabs and King Sand Crabs, which also drop rock-shell gloves and rock-shell boots. Once all the raw materials have been obtained, these can be brought to Skulgrimen in Rellekka, to be made into the rock-shell armour. All pieces can also be traded on the Grand Exchange.

Armour Shell piece Hide(s) Fee
Rock-shell helm 24,618 1 Rock-shell chunk 11,617 1 Dagannoth hide 255 5,000
Rock-shell plate 38,293 1 Rock-shell shard 20,673 3 Dagannoth hides 765 10,000
Rock-shell legs 38,247 1 Rock-shell splinter 22,563 2 Dagannoth hides 510 7,500
Rock-shell gloves 833 N/A
Rock-shell boots 424
Total 102,415

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Rock-shell armour is not considered to be metallic, so Ava's devices function normally with it.
